sections.TOP: Captain of the Guards020625cv1g6dr6g8hnjkea8q81168hgsrlp3w1099852013-12-27T02:46:04ZGonzalo848331/* Known Captains of the Guards */'''Captain of the Guards''' is a title granted by a lord to a member of his household. The position confers the responsibility for commanding and organizing the guardsmen of a garrison charged with the vigilance and defense of the lord's castle or town or the protection of his family and/or retainers.
